subject: Alexander MacRae's EVP Work...
author: Guy
full_text:
Lest we think this forum is just the "Frank/Misty/Lonestar" 
show... :)

I'm going to start posting a few things about Alec's work with the 
Alpha Interface Unit he developed.

Here's an article from Fate magazine (July 1, 2000):

"The Alpha Mystery" by Jose Feola

http://www.llewellyn.com/archive/fate/38/

Plus I'm adding 2 papers Alec has written about EVP and the Alpha 
Unit (particularly of importance is the capturing of EVP in a 
soundproof Faraday cage):

"A Bio-electromagnetic Device of Unusual Properties" (published in 
the Journal of the Society for Psychical Research)

http://www.skyelab.co.uk/review/aa.htm

"Report of an Anomalous Speech Products Experiment inside a Double 
Screened Room"

http://www.skyelab.co.uk/review/bb.htm

You can also buy Alec's book and EVP sampler CD online:

http://www.lulu.com/evp

Next time - I'll post about Alec's funded EVP research project 
called "The Intelligence Project" along with charts and the samples 
that the international listening panel (which I was a member of) 
judged. Hopefully - he'll be sending me both the interim report and 
final report so I can put them in the "Files" area.

Guy Jackson
Huntington Beach, CA
Audio Data Coordinator, Paranormal Research Investigations, Anaheim, 
CA
Member AAEVP
BSEE, 1980, University of Illinois at Champaign
